text: The Vamps are a British pop rock band consisting of Bradley Simpson, James McVey, Connor Ball and Tristan Evans. == Members == * Bradley Simpson - lead vocals, rhythm guitar (2012-present) * James McVey - lead guitar, backing vocals (2012-present) * Connor Ball - bass, backing vocals (2012-present) * Tristan Evans - drums, backing vocals (2012-present) == Tours == The Vamps supported McFly on their Memory Lane Tour in April and May 2013 and Selena Gomez at London's Hammersmith Apollo on 7 and 8 September 2013. In 2022, they did a tour of the UK and Ireland to celebrate their ten years in music. == References == == Other websites == Category:2012 establishments in the United Kingdom Category:Alternative rock bands Category:British boy bands Category:British pop rock bands Category:English punk bands Category:Musical groups established in 2012 Category:New wave bands Category:Pop punk bands
title: The Vamps (British band)
